attributes.action: WE THE PEOPLE OF THE UNITED KINGDOM AND GREAT BRITAIN  DEMAND THAT POLITICIANS ABSTAIN FROM EVEN TALKING ABOUT RECEIVING ANY MORE EXPENSES
attributes.additional_details: WE THE PEOPLE WILL NO LONGER TOLERATE THE UTTER GREED OF THE PEOPLE WE ELECT TO SERVE US, WE DEMAND THAT ANY POLITICIAN OF ANY PARTY WHO ASKS OR DEMANDS MORE EXPENSES THAN THEY RECEIVE NOW MUST BE MADE BY THE GOVERNMENT TO CALL A LOCAL ELECTION TO SAVE HIS OR HER SEAT, NO OTHER WORKING PERSON IN BRITAIN GETS THE BENEFITS THAT THESE PEOPLE DO, AND THEY HAVE THE TEMERITY TO PICK ON THE ELDERLY DISABLED AND UNEMPLOYED AND OUR PENSIONS AND THEY WANT MORE! THIS REALY IS THE LAST STRAW.WE THE PEOPLE OF GREAT BRITAIN WILL NO LONGER TOLERATE THIS.
